place.name: RADWELL
place.gazetteerText: RADWELL, a parish in Hitchin district, Herts; 1½mile N W by N of Baldock r. station. Post-town, Baldock. Acres, 748. Real property, £1, 331. Pop., 102. Houses, 15. The property is divided among a few. R. House is the residence of G. Johnstone, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Rochester. Value, £226.* Patron, F. Pym, Esq. The church is ancient but good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
